top_note: This comprehensive estimate covers complete pack-out 3-month climate-controlled storage and pack-in services for all basement and kitchen contents at 140 Feathers Lane Linden VA with delivery to Centreville VA destination using current DMV area professional service rates.
bottom_note:
ACCESS AND LOGISTICS:
Basement access through narrow passages and stairs requires specialized handling equipment and additional crew coordination
Backyard gate access considerations for larger furniture pieces including china cabinet leather sofas dining tables
Driveway positioning coordination for efficient loading of glass-top tables appliances and heavy furniture pieces
Property access management for safe movement of fragile items and specialized equipment

SPECIAL HANDLING REQUIREMENTS:
Round glass-top dining table and glass-top coffee tables require custom padding extra care protection and specialized transport
Live potted plants excluded from standard packing service requiring customer coordination for separate relocation
China cabinet contents including dishes glassware individually packed in dish pack boxes with professional dividers
Ping pong table professional disassembly for transport and reassembly at destination included in setup services
Leather furniture protected with specialized covers and blankets during extended storage period

STORAGE AND TIMELINE:
Extended 3-month storage period in climate-controlled warehouse facility with consistent temperature and humidity control
Professional inventory documentation provided for insurance claim purposes with detailed item tracking
Contents organized in warehouse sections for efficient retrieval including basement furniture kitchen appliances dishware
Storage facility features 24/7 security monitoring access control systems and professional warehouse management

CREW AND EQUIPMENT:
All crew members licensed insured and background checked for residential contents manipulation services
Specialized equipment included for challenging basement access stairs navigation and glass furniture handling
Professional moving equipment dollies furniture straps protective padding and stair climbing equipment provided
Four-person crew sizing ensures efficient safe handling of heavy appliances furniture and fragile glass items

QUALITY ASSURANCE:
Customer walkthrough and satisfaction confirmation required upon completion of all pack-in services
Post-delivery cleanup and debris removal included in final placement and positioning services
Professional setup includes complete unpacking placement and reassembly per customer specifications
Final invoice may vary based on actual field conditions access challenges and additional services required
